fileName: Shipping Package RESTful Developer Guide_2024 latest.pdf

blocks.text: UPS 배송 패키지 API 개발자 가이드
UPS 배송 서비스를 사용하는 방법을 알려줍니다.
개발자들이 앱을 만들 때 필요한 정보가 들어있습니다.
UPS 개발자 키트 API를 사용할 때는 규칙을 지켜야 합니다.
UPS와 맺은 기술 계약서에 따라 개발해야 합니다.
다음은 꼭 지켜야 할 법적 요구사항들입니다.

vocabularyAnalysis.definition: 반드시 충족해야 하는 조건이나 필요한 것
examples: 시험을 보려면 출석 요구사항을 만족해야 해요

blocks.text: 모든 규칙은 UPS 기술 계약서에 자세히 나와 있습니다.
이 문서는 허용된 나라에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.
허용된 지역은 UPS 기술 계약서에 정해져 있습니다.
계약서에서 정한 나라에서만 이 API를 쓸 수 있습니다.
앱은 UPS API 정보를 다른 사람에게 함부로 주면 안 됩니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 UPS API 사용 규칙 설명 이미지. 컴퓨터 화면에 UPS 로고와 보안 자물쇠 아이콘, 정보 보호를 나타내는 방패 모양. 밝은 파란색과 갈색 색상, 만화풍, 텍스트 금지
blocks.alt: UPS API 정보 보호 규칙을 나타내는 이미지

blocks.text: 정당한 이유가 있는 사람에게만 정보를 줄 수 있습니다.
예를 들어 보내는 사람이나 받는 사람에게만 줄 수 있습니다.
UPS가 허가한 서비스 제공자에게도 줄 수 있습니다.

examples: 부모님이 친구 집에 가는 것을 허가해 주셨어요

blocks.text: 다른 사람에게는 절대 정보를 주면 안 됩니다.
UPS API 정보를 보여주는 모든 화면에는 UPS 마크가 있어야 합니다.
UPS 마크는 정보 근처에 적당한 크기로 놓아야 합니다.
사람들이 이 정보가 UPS에서 온 것임을 쉽게 알 수 있어야 합니다.
UPS 마크가 있는 모든 화면 아래쪽에는 특별한 문구를 써야 합니다.

vocabularyAnalysis.definition: 특정한 의미를 담은 짧은 글이나 말

blocks.text: 'UPS, UPS 브랜드 마크, 갈색은 미국 UPS의 상표입니다.'
이 규칙 외에는 UPS의 미리 쓴 허가 없이 UPS 마크를 쓸 수 없습니다.
UPS 마크를 다른 회사 상표와 함께 쓰면 안 됩니다.
사람들이 두 회사가 함께 일한다고 헷갈릴 수 있기 때문입니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 UPS 마크 사용 규칙 설명 이미지. UPS 갈색 방패 로고 주변에 적절한 여백 공간, 올바른 사용법과 잘못된 사용법 비교. 명확한 구분선, 밝은 색상, 만화풍, 텍스트 금지
blocks.alt: UPS 마크의 올바른 사용법을 보여주는 이미지

blocks.text: UPS 마크는 UPS가 제공한 형태로만 써야 합니다.
마크의 크기나 색깔을 바꾸면 안 됩니다.
움직이게 하거나 모양을 바꾸는 것도 금지입니다.

vocabularyAnalysis.definition: 법이나 규칙으로 하지 못하게 막는 것

blocks.text: UPS 마크를 다른 기호나 글자와 합치면 안 됩니다.
UPS 마크 주변에는 빈 공간이 있어야 합니다.
빈 공간의 크기는 UPS 마크 높이의 3분의 1이어야 합니다.
앱과 POD 편지에는 UPS의 저작권 표시를 넣어야 합니다.
이 표시는 눈에 잘 보이는 곳에 넣어야 합니다.
UPS가 정한 형태와 형식으로 써야 합니다.

vocabularyAnalysis.definition: 창작물을 만든 사람이 가지는 법적 권리

blocks.text: 자세한 내용은 이 문서의 저작권 부분을 보세요.
앱은 다른 배송 회사의 정보를 보여주면 안 됩니다.
UPS API 정보가 있는 페이지에서는 다른 배송 서비스를 보여주면 안 됩니다.
UPS API에서 받은 모든 데이터는 그대로 보여줘야 합니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 데이터 표시 규칙 설명 이미지. 컴퓨터 화면에 UPS 정보만 깔끔하게 표시된 모습, 다른 배송회사 로고는 X표시로 금지 표현. 명확한 구분, 밝은 색상, 만화풍, 텍스트 금지
blocks.alt: UPS 정보만 표시하는 올바른 방법을 보여주는 이미지

blocks.text: 정보를 바꾸거나 지우거나 수정하면 안 됩니다.
받은 정보를 정확히 그대로 사용자에게 보여줘야 합니다.
UPS와 이 문서에 대해 이야기할 때는 표지의 날짜를 말해주세요.

examples: 책 표지에 제목과 작가 이름이 써 있어요

blocks.text: 문의할 때 이 날짜를 꼭 알려주세요.
© 2022 미국 UPS 주식회사. 모든 권리 보유.
UPS의 서면 허가 없이는 이 문서를 사용할 수 없습니다.
다른 곳으로 옮기거나 전송하는 것도 엄격히 금지됩니다.

examples: 회사의 기밀 정보는 함부로 말하면 안 돼요

blocks.text: 이 규칙을 어기면 법적 문제가 생길 수 있습니다.
일부 UPS 앱은 미국 우편 서비스의 정보를 사용합니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 상표와 저작권 개념 설명 이미지. UPS 갈색 방패 로고와 저작권 기호(©), 법적 보호를 나타내는 방패와 자물쇠. 밝은 색상, 만화풍, 텍스트 금지
blocks.alt: 상표와 저작권이 법적으로 보호받는 모습을 나타내는 이미지

blocks.text: 도시, 주, 우편번호 정보를 독점적이지 않은 라이선스로 받았습니다.
© 2023 미국 UPS 주식회사. 모든 권리 보유.

vocabularyAnalysis.definition: 특정한 것을 사용할 수 있는 공식적인 허가
examples: 운전 라이선스가 있어야 차를 몰 수 있어요

blocks.text: 4장: 배송 패키지 RESTful API 요소와 세부사항
배송 패키지 RESTful API 자주 묻는 질문
이 문서는 UPS 배송 패키지 RESTful API를 사용하는 방법을 알려줍니다.
여러분의 앱이나 서비스, 시스템에 이 API를 연결하는 방법을 설명합니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 API 연결 개념 설명 이미지. 컴퓨터와 UPS 서버가 선으로 연결된 모습, 데이터가 화살표로 오가는 모습. 밝은 파란색과 갈색, 만화풍, 텍스트 금지
blocks.alt: 컴퓨터와 UPS 서버가 API로 연결되어 정보를 주고받는 모습

blocks.text: 이 가이드에서 찾을 수 있는 내용들:

items: 배송 패키지 RESTful API 기능과 비즈니스 규칙
배송 패키지 RESTful API 자주 묻는 질문

blocks.text: 이 모든 정보가 이 문서에 들어있습니다.
UPS 배송 패키지 RESTful API를 자신의 앱에 연결할 개발자들이 읽어야 합니다.
서비스나 시스템에 연결하려는 개발자들도 이 가이드를 사용하세요.
이 가이드는 여러분이 다음 내용을 기본적으로 안다고 가정합니다:

items: UPS 개발자 키트 소개 가이드의 개념과 지침

blocks.text: 이런 기본 지식이 있어야 이 가이드를 잘 이해할 수 있습니다.

vocabularyAnalysis.definition: 어떤 것을 사실이라고 미리 생각하는 것
examples: 비가 올 것이라고 가정하고 우산을 가져갔어요

blocks.text: 만약 이런 지식이 부족하다면 먼저 공부하고 오세요.
UPS 개발자 키트를 처음 사용한다면 소개 가이드부터 읽으세요.
소개 가이드는 모든 API 가이드의 기초가 됩니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 가이드 사용 순서 설명 이미지. 1단계부터 3단계까지 화살표로 연결된 책들, 각 단계별로 다른 색상. 밝은 색상, 만화풍, 텍스트 금지
blocks.alt: 가이드를 순서대로 읽는 방법을 보여주는 이미지

blocks.text: 3장에는 UPS 통합 환경에 대한 정보가 있습니다.
4장에는 배송 패키지 RESTful API의 주요 구성요소가 설명되어 있습니다.

examples: 컴퓨터의 구성요소에는 모니터, 키보드, 마우스가 있어요

blocks.text: 참고 표와 오류 코드는 부록에 있습니다.
고객 통합 환경(CIE)에 대한 설명은 3장에 있습니다.
© 2023 미국 UPS 주식회사. 모든 권리 보유.
배송 수준 수정자를 위한 NextGen 업데이트가 있었습니다.
ShipmentResponse에 새로운 응답 컨테이너와 요소들이 추가되었습니다.

examples: 새로운 게임이 다음 달에 릴리스될 예정이에요

blocks.text: GlobalTaxInformation이 새로 추가되어 다음 기능들을 지원합니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 소프트웨어 업데이트 개념 설명 이미지. 컴퓨터 화면에 새로운 기능들이 추가되는 모습, 업그레이드 화살표와 새로운 아이콘들. 밝은 녹색과 파란색, 만화풍, 텍스트 금지
blocks.alt: 소프트웨어에 새로운 기능이 추가되는 업데이트 과정을 보여주는 이미지

Void Package Testing: https://wwwcie.ups.com/ship/v1/shipments/cancel/{shipmentidentificationnumber} Production: https://onlinetools.ups.com/ship/v1/shipments/cancel/{shipmentidentificationnumber} UPS has set aside several shipping identification and tracking numbers to help developers test their applications.

These special numbers are only valid in the Customer Integration Environment at wwwcie.ups.com.

The following table lists those special numbers and describes the results that developers should expect when attempting a request. For each test case, the first number listed is a shipment identification number; additional numbers, if present, are tracking numbers.  Note that only these numbers may be used in the Customer Integration Environment when voiding shipments.

Number(s) Expected Result ShipmentIdentificationNumber: A successful response will be returned for a shipment level cancel request. 1ZISDE016691676846 A successful response will be returned for a shipment level cancel request.

ShipmentIdentificationNumber: 1Z2220060290602143 ShipmentIdentificationNumber: A successful response will be returned for a package level cancel request. The 1Z2220060294314162 request will cancel the package in the shipment.

TrackingNumber: 1Z2220060291994175 © 2023 United Parcel Service of America, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Confidential and Proprietary 22

Number(s) Expected Result ShipmentIdentificationNumber: A successful response will be returned for a package level cancel request. The 1Z2220060292690189 request will cancel the package in the shipment.

TrackingNumber: 1Z2220060292002190 ShipmentIdentificationNumber: A successful response will be returned for a package level cancel request. The 1ZISDE016691609089 request will cancel all the packages TrackingNumbers: 1ZISDE016694068891 1ZISDE016690889305 ShipmentIdentificationNumber: A successful response will be returned with a partial cancel for a package level 1Z2220060290530202 void request. The request will cancel package 1Z2220060293874210 but package 1Z2220060292634221 cannot be canceled.

TrackingNumbers: 1Z2220060293874210 1Z2220060292634221 Label Recovery Testing: https://wwwcie.ups.com/ship/{version}/shipments/labels Production: https://onlinetools.ups.com/ship/{version}/shipments/labels To ensure that your application has the ability to process PDF and html responses correctly test your Label Recovery application using a set similar to 1Zs listed below: Number(s) Scenario Expected Result 1Z12345E8791315509 Label returned in PDF format Request is processed, label returned in PDF format 1Z12345E8791315413 Label returned in html format Request is processed, label returned in html format To ensure that your application has the ability to process UPS Premier Silver, Gold and Platinum shipment related labels and correctly test your Label Recovery application use the following 1Z and label image types: NUMBER(S) SCENARIO EXPECTED RESULT 1ZTESTAN0154809878 UPS Premier Silver Shipment Request is processed, label returned in ZPL format - Label returned in ZPL format 1ZTESTAN8480418532 UPS Premier Gold Return Request is processed, label returned in html and Pdf Shipment - Label returned in format GIF(html) and pdf format 1ZTESTAN0150617707 UPS Premier Platinum Request is processed, label returned in html and Pdf Shipment - Label returned in format GIF(html) and pdf format © 2023 United Parcel Service of America, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Confidential and Proprietary 23

Chapter 4: Shipping Package RESTful API Elements and Details The following constraints applies to all APIs referenced in this developer guide.  UPS expects elements as defined in the path and presented in the structure i.e., no spelling or structural deviations. Elements that are not defined or do not conform to the structure will be ignored by UPS.

Element constraints are defined as follows: Name The element or container name.

Constraints Required • Yes - indicates the element must be present in the request or response. • Yes* - indicates the element must be present in the request if the parent container is present in the request. • No - indicates the element is optional and may be used if it applies to the request. • Cond – indicates the element is required under certain conditions.

Type • Container - holds a group of related elements. • String - consists of alphanumeric characters, spaces, and decimals. • Array – collection of values that allows to provide a list of values. An array begins with [ (left bracket) and ends with ] (right bracket). Its values are separated by , (comma). • Header – header parameter • Path – URL path parameter • Query – URL query parameter Length • The maximum number of characters that can be present in a String. Length is not applicable (N/A) to Containers.

Max Allowed • The maximum number of elements or containers that can be present in the parent container.

Description A description of the element or container. Also any validation rules associated with the element/container. © 2023 United Parcel Service of America, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Confidential and Proprietary 24

AccessLicenseNumber Type: Header Contact your UPS Length: 16 representative for additional information.

Required: Yes The customers MyUPS Username Type: Header username Length: 16 Required: Yes The customers MyUPS Password Type: Header password Length: 26 Used to authorize the access to API. See the New version Type: Path section for the latest Ship release. Supported values: v1, Length: 5 v1601, v1607, v1701, 1801 Query Parameters Name Constrint Description Valid Values: Required: Yes additionaladdressvalidation Type: Query city = validation will include city.

Length: 15 © 2023 United Parcel Service of America, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Confidential and Proprietary 25

Shipment Request Name Constraint Description {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {}}} Shipment Required: Yes Container for Shipment Information.

Type: Container Max Allowed: 1 Length: N/A {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Description”: {}}}} Description Required: Cond The Description of Goods for the shipment. Applies to international and Type: String domestic shipments. Provide a detailed description of items being Max Allowed: 1 shipped for documents and non-documents. Examples: "annual Length: 1…50 reports" and "9 mm steel screws".

Required if all of the listed conditions are true: ShipFrom and ShipTo countries or territories are not the same; The packaging type is not UPS Letter; The ShipFrom and or ShipTo countries or territories are not in the European Union or the ShipFrom and ShipTo countries or territories are both in the European Union and the shipments service type is not UPS Standard. {"ShipmentRequest:{"Shipment:{"GlobalTaxInformation”: {}}}} GlobalTaxInformation Required: Cond Container used to define the properties required for GlobalTaxID.

blocks.text: UPS는 개발자들이 프로그램을 테스트할 수 있도록 특별한 번호들을 준비했습니다.
이 번호들은 테스트 환경에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.
각 테스트 번호마다 다른 결과가 나옵니다.
첫 번째 번호는 배송 식별 번호입니다.
배송 취소는 배송 전체를 취소하는 것입니다.
패키지 취소는 일부 패키지만 취소하는 것입니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 UPS 배송 취소 테스트 과정 이미지. 컴퓨터 화면에 테스트 번호 입력, 성공/실패 결과 표시. 밝은 파란색과 초록색, 간단한 아이콘, 만화풍

blocks.text: 이 번호로 테스트하면 성공 메시지가 나옵니다.
두 개의 추적 번호와 함께 사용합니다.
이렇게 다양한 상황을 테스트할 수 있습니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 배송 패키지 취소 과정 이미지. 여러 개의 박스 중 일부는 체크표시(취소됨), 일부는 X표시(취소 안됨). 밝은 색상, 간단한 아이콘

blocks.text: 라벨 복구는 배송 라벨을 다시 받는 기능입니다.
PDF 형식과 HTML 형식으로 받을 수 있습니다.
프로그램이 두 형식을 모두 처리할 수 있는지 확인해야 합니다.
두 형식 모두 정상적으로 처리되어야 합니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 UPS 라벨 형식 비교 이미지. PDF 문서와 HTML 웹페이지 아이콘을 나란히 배치. 밝은 색상, 간단한 아이콘, 만화풍

blocks.text: 각 등급마다 다른 라벨 형식을 사용합니다.
API를 사용할 때 지켜야 할 규칙들이 있습니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 API 구조 설명 이미지. 컴퓨터와 서버가 정해진 규칙으로 대화하는 모습. 체크리스트와 규칙서 아이콘. 밝은 색상, 만화풍
9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 데이터 타입 설명 이미지. Container(상자), String(글자), Array(목록) 등을 간단한 아이콘으로 표현. 밝은 색상, 만화풍

blocks.text: 부모 컨테이너 안에 들어갈 수 있는 최대 개수입니다.
Authorization은 온보딩 과정에서 받은 액세스 키입니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 API 헤더 정보 이미지. 신분증, 열쇠, 비밀번호 등의 아이콘으로 인증 과정 표현. 밝은 색상, 간단한 아이콘

blocks.text: Authentication Token은 사용자명과 비밀번호 대신 사용할 수 있습니다.
API 접근 권한을 확인하는 데 사용됩니다.
city 값을 사용하면 도시 검증이 포함됩니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 배송 요청 구조 이미지. 큰 상자 안에 작은 상자들이 들어있는 모습으로 컨테이너 구조 표현. 밝은 색상, 간단한 도식

blocks.text: 국제 배송과 국내 배송 모두에 적용됩니다.
배송하는 물품에 대한 자세한 설명을 제공해야 합니다.

This billing option is valid for a shipment charge type of Transportation only. Only applies to US/PR and PR/US shipment origins and destination. This payment method allows you to bill the charges for a specified shipment to a consignee who has agreed to pay the charges. All shipping charges are billed to the consignees UPS account number including the following accessorials: Additional Handling, Delivery Area Surcharges, Delivery Change Requests, Early AM Premium, Early AM Out of Territory, Fuel Surcharge, Hazardous Material Surcharges, Large Package Surcharge, Over Max Limits and Saturday Delivery. Length: 0 Negotiated Rates are of two types Account Based Rates (ABR) and Web Discount Rates. Negotiated Rates are only returned for qualified Shipper Account Numbers. Eligibility is determined using the combination of UserId and the Shipper’s Shipper Account Number. If the user is qualified, both Published rates and Negotiated rates are returned to the user. If the UserId and Shipper Account Number are not qualified for Negotiated rates, a warning message is returned that indicates ineligibility and only the Published rates are returned in the response. blocks.text: 이 문서는 UPS 배송 시스템을 사용하는 방법을 설명합니다.
개발자들이 배송 요청을 만들 때 필요한 정보를 담고 있습니다.
각 필드의 규칙과 사용법을 자세히 알아보겠습니다.
배송을 보내는 곳의 정보를 입력해야 합니다.
반송 배송의 경우 최대 1개 국가만 허용됩니다.
배송지, 출발지, 발송인 중 최소 2곳이 같은 국가여야 합니다.
제3국 계약이 있는지 확인해야 할 수도 있습니다.
공급업체의 세금 관련 정보를 입력하는 곳입니다.
여러 종류의 세금 번호를 사용할 수 있습니다.
세금 번호는 최대 35글자까지 입력할 수 있습니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 UPS 배송 시스템 개념도. 박스가 출발지에서 목적지로 이동하는 모습을 단순한 화살표와 아이콘으로 표현. 출발지, 목적지, 배송 트럭이 포함된 밝은 색상의 만화풍 이미지

blocks.text: 최대 3개의 배송비 항목을 설정할 수 있습니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 결제 방법 선택 화면. 신용카드, 계좌번호, 제3자 결제 옵션을 큰 아이콘으로 표현. 밝은 색상, 단순한 디자인, 텍스트 최소화

blocks.text: 물건을 보내는 사람이 비용을 내는 방법입니다.
계좌번호, 신용카드, 다른 결제 방법 중 선택합니다.
반송 서비스에는 신용카드를 쓸 수 없습니다.
여러 종류의 신용카드를 사용할 수 있습니다.
아메리칸 익스프레스, 비자, 마스터카드 등이 있습니다.
카드 뒷면이나 앞면에서 찾을 수 있습니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 주소 입력 폼. 집 모양 아이콘과 함께 주소 입력 칸들을 단순하게 표현. 도로명, 도시, 우편번호 필드가 명확히 구분된 밝은 색상의 만화풍 이미지

blocks.text: 페이팔 같은 다른 결제 서비스도 사용할 수 있습니다.
계좌번호, 신용카드, 다른 방법 중 하나만 선택합니다.
물건을 받는 사람이 비용을 내는 방법입니다.
반송 배송에서는 운송비에 사용할 수 없습니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 제3자 결제 개념도. 발송인, 받는 사람, 제3자가 삼각형으로 연결된 모습. 돈 기호와 화살표로 결제 흐름을 단순하게 표현한 밝은 색상의 만화풍 이미지

blocks.text: 발송인도 받는 사람도 아닌 다른 사람이 내는 방법입니다.
받는 사람이 직접 UPS에 비용을 내는 방법입니다.
받는 사람이 미리 비용 지불에 동의해야 합니다.
운송비와 관세를 다르게 결제할 수 있습니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 화물 운송 개념도. 큰 트럭과 팔레트, 포크리프트가 포함된 물류 창고 모습. 박스들이 체계적으로 정리된 밝은 색상의 만화풍 이미지

blocks.text: 운송비는 반드시 UPS 계좌로 결제해야 합니다.
일일 픽업이나 수시 계좌만 사용 가능합니다.
큰 화물을 보낼 때 사용하는 특별한 결제 방식입니다.
높이 조정 기능도 사용할 수 있습니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 배송 서비스 선택 화면. 다양한 배송 속도 옵션을 시계와 비행기 아이콘으로 표현. 당일배송, 익일배송, 일반배송을 색깔별로 구분한 밝은 색상의 만화풍 이미지

blocks.text: UPS는 여러 가지 배송 서비스를 제공합니다.
반송 배송에는 사용할 수 없는 서비스들이 있습니다.
배송하는 물건의 총 가격을 입력하는 곳입니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 송장과 계산기 이미지. 종이 문서와 계산기, 돈 기호가 포함된 회계 업무 모습. 숫자와 표가 간단하게 표현된 밝은 색상의 만화풍 이미지

blocks.text: 미국에서 푸에르토리코나 캐나다로 보낼 때 필요합니다.

For MI Return shipments, the Mail Manifest ID (MMI) is concatenated with the system time.

The unique identifier (key) is required to link the package and the Mail Innovations portion of Dual Return shipment. If unique identifier (key) is empty in the request for UPS Mail Innovations Return Service, the request will be treated as the first phase of the Mail Innovations Dual Returns Request. If the MIDualReturnShipmentIndicator is present with empty or null MIDualReturnShipmentKey in UPS Package Return Shipment, the request will be treated as the first phase of Dual MI Return Label Shipment. VoiceMessage phone number or TextMessage phone number or email address is required for ADL notification and UAP Shipper notification. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“Notification”: {“TextMessage”: {“PhoneNumber”: {}}}}}}} PhoneNumber Required: Yes* Phone number for receiving Text Alternate Delivery Location notification Type: String and UAP Shipper notification.

Max Allowed: 1 Length: 1…15 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“Notification”: {“Locale”: {}}}}}} Locale Required: Cond This container is used for providing Language and dialect details for Type: Container Alternate Delivery Location notifications and UAP Shipper notifications.

Max Allowed: 1 Valid only for Alternate Delivery Location notification and UAP Shipper Length: N/A notification. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“Notification”: {“Locale”: {“Language”: {}}}}}}} Language Required: Yes* Refer to Language/Dialect Combinations in the Appendix for valid pairs.

Type: String Max Allowed: 1 Length: 3 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“Notification”:{“Locale”: {“Dialect”: {}}}}}}} Dialect Required: Yes* Refer to Language/Dialect Combinations in the Appendix for valid pairs.

Type: String Max Allowed: 1 Length: 2 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“LabelDelivery”: {}}}}} LabelDelivery Required: Cond Container for the Label Delivery accessorial. Note - LabelDelivery is not Type: Container applicable for GFP and Mail Innovations Forward shipment.

Max Allowed: 1 Required for shipments with either Electronic Return Label Return Length: N/A Service or ImportControl Electronic LabelMethod type. Optional for shipments with Print Return Label Return Service or ImportControl Print LabelMethod type or Forward movement. If this container is present for shipments with either Electronic Return Label Return Service or ImportControl Electronic LabelMethod type, either of the LabelLinksIndicator or EMail container should be provided. For shipments with Print Return Label Return Service or ImportControl Print LabelMethod type or Forward movement, only LabelLinksIndicator is valid option for LabelDelivery container. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“LabelDelivery”: {“EMail”: {}}}}}} EMail Required: No Container for the email message.

Type: Container Max Allowed: 1 Length: N/A {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“LabelDelivery”: {“EMail”: {“EMailAddress”: {}}}}}}} EMailAddress Required: Yes* The destination eMail address for the Label Delivery.

Type: String © 2023 United Parcel Service of America, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Confidential and Proprietary 52

Name Constraint Description Max Allowed: 1 Length: 1…50 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“LabelDelivery”: {“EMail”: {“UndeliverableEMailAddress”: {}}}}}}} UndeliverableEMailAddr Required: No The address where an undeliverable email message is sent if the Label ess Type: String Delivery email is undeliverable.

Max Allowed: 1 Defaults to FromEMailAddress.

Length: 1…50 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“LabelDelivery”: {“EMail”: {“FromEMailAddress”: {}}}}}}} FromEMailAddress Required: Yes* The e-mail address specifies the Reply To E-mail address. The "From"

Type: String field of the message header contains pkginfo@ups.com.

Max Allowed: 1 Length: 1…50 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“LabelDelivery”: {“EMail”: {“FromName”: {}}}}}}} FromName Required: No The "FrontName" is the name from which notification will appear.

Type: String Defaults to the "Shipper Name".

Max Allowed: 1 Length: 1…35 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“LabelDelivery”: {“EMail”: {“Memo”: {}}}}}}} Memo Required: No User defined text that will be included in the email.

Type: String Max Allowed: 1 Length: 1…150 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“LabelDelivery”: {“EMail”: {“Subject”: {}}}}}}} Subject Required: No The eMails subject. Defaults to the Label Delivery Notification plus the Type: String shipment ID. Defaults to text provided by UPS.

Max Allowed: 1 Length: 1…75 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“LabelDelivery”: {“”: {“EMail/SubjectCode”: {}}}}}} SubjectCode Required: No Specifies a reference code and reference number to display in the Type: String subject of the Label Delivery notification. When the subject code is Max Allowed: 1 provided, the subject will contain the following: UPS Label Delivery, the Length: 2 reference code (the reference code will be mapped to the corresponding ANSI value) and the reference number.

If the subject code tag is not provided and the subject text is provided, the subject of the notification will be the subject text. If the subject text is provided, and the subject code tag exists, then the subject code value must be 08. If Subject code is 08, subject text must exist. If a subject code is provided that refers to a nonexistent reference number, the subject will default to the shipment identification number. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ ”: {“LabelDelivery”: {“”: {“LabelLinksIndicator”: {}}}}}} LabelLinksIndicator Required: No Indicates the Label and Receipt URLs are to be returned in the Type: String response. Applicable for ImportControl Electronic Labels or for Max Allowed: 1 ReturnService Electronic Labels.

Length: 0 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {}}}}} InternationalForms Required: No International Forms information.

Name Constraint Description {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“FormType”: {}}}}}} FormType Required: Yes* Indicates the name of the International Form requested. Valid values: Type: String 01 - Invoice Max Allowed: 6 03 - CO Length: 2 04 - NAFTA CO 05 - Partial Invoice 06 - Packinglist 07 - Customer Generated Forms 08 – Air Freight Packing List 09 - CN22 Form 10 – UPS Premium Care Form 11 - EEI For shipment with return service, 05 or 10 are the only valid values.

Note: 01 and 05 are mutually exclusive and 05 are only valid for return shipments only. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“UserCreatedForm”: {}}}}}} UserCreatedForm Required: Cond Data container for DocumentID(s).

Type: Container Required if Form Type is 07.

Max Allowed: 1 Length: N/A {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“UserCreatedForm/DocumentID”: {}}}}}} DocumentID Required: Yes* DocumentID represents a document uploaded to Forms History.

Type: String Max Allowed: 13 Length: 26 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“UPSPremiumCareForm”: {}}}}}} UPSPremiumCareForm Required: Cond UPS Premium Care Form is required if UPS Premium Care Indicator is Type: Container present on a package.

Max Allowed: 1 Valid only for Canada to Canada movements.

Type: String Valid Format: yyyyMMdd Max Allowed: 1 Length: N/A {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“UPSPremiumCareForm”: {“PageSize”: {}}}}}}} PageSize Required: Yes* Size of UPS Premium Care Form.

Type: String Valid values: 01 = A4 Size 02 = Letter Size Max Allowed: 1 Length: 2 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“UPSPremiumCareForm”: {“PrintType”: {}}}}}}} PrintType Required: Yes* Format of UPS Premium Care Form.

Type: String Valid values: 01 = PNG 02 = PDF Max Allowed: 1 Length: 2 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“UPSPremiumCareForm”: {“NumOfCopies”: {}}}}}}} NumOfCopies Required: Yes* Number of Copies of UPS Premium Care Form.

Type: String Valid value is 02. © 2023 United Parcel Service of America, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Confidential and Proprietary 54

Two languages are required Type: String for UPS Premium Care Form.

Max Allowed: 2 Valid values: eng = US English fra = Canadian French Length: 3 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“CN22Form”: {}}}}}} CN22Form Required: Cond Container for the CN22 form.

Max Allowed: 1 Length: N/A {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“CN22Form”: {“LabelSize”: {}}}}}}} LabelSize Required: Yes* Provide the valid values: 6 = 4X6 1 = 8.5X11 Type: String Required if the CN22 form container is present.

Max Allowed: 1 Length: {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“CN22Form”: {“CN22Content”: {“CN22ContentDescription”: {}}}}}}}} CN22ContentDescription Required: Yes* Detailed description of the content.

Type: String If the combined MI package and CN22 label is requested, only the first Max Allowed: 1 30 characters will appear on the combined label.

Length: 105 Required if the CN22 form container is present. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“CN22Form”: {“CN22Content”: {“CN22ContentWeight”: {}}}}}}}} CN22ContentWeight Required: Yes* Container for CN22 content weight.

Type: Container Max Allowed: 1 Length: N/A {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“CN22Form”: {“CN22Content”: {“CN22ContentWeight”: {“UnitOfMeasurement”: {}}}}}}}}} UnitOfMeasurement Required: Yes* Container for UOM.

Type: Container Max Allowed: 1 Length: N/A {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“CN22Form”: {“CN22Content”: {“CN22ContentWeight”: {“UnitOfMeasurement”: {“Code”: {}}}}}}}}}} Code Required: Yes* Required if weight is provided, valid values are lbs. and ozs.

Max Allowed: 1 Required if the CN22 form container is present.

Length: 7 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“CN22Form”: {“CN22Content”: {“CN22ContentTotalValue”: {}}}}}}}} CN22ContentTotalValue Required: Yes* Total value of the items associated with this content.

Type: String Required if the CN22 form container is present.

Max Allowed: 1 Length: 9 © 2023 United Parcel Service of America, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Confidential and Proprietary 56

Name Constraint Description {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“CN22Form”: {“CN22Content”: {“CN22ContentCurrencyCode”: {}}}}}}}} CN22ContentCurrencyC Required: Yes* Currently only USD is supported. ode Type: String Required if the CN22 form container is present.

Max Allowed: 1 Length: 3 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“CN22Form”: {“CN22Content”: {“CN22ContentCountryOfOrigin”: {}}}}}}}} CN22ContentCountryOf Required: No Country or Territory of Origin from where the CN22 contents originated.

Origin Type: String Max Allowed: 1 Length: 2 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“CN22Form”: {“CN22Content”: {“CN22ContentTariffNumber”: {}}}}}}}} CN22ContentTariffNumb Required: No The tariff number associated with the CN22 contents. er Type: String Max Allowed: 1 Length: 40 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“AdditionalDocumentIndicator”: {}}}}}} AdditionalDocumentIndic Required: No Presence of the indicator means user will supply additional document, ator Type: String such as EEI, NAFTA_CO or CO.

Max Allowed: 1 This indicator should be set when the shipper intends to utilize UPS Length: 0 paperless invoice functionality AND the shipper has SELF-PREPARED other International Forms (EEI, CO, NAFTACO) to accompany the shipment. It is evaluated only when: 1. Account is paperless enabled. 2.

Movement requires an invoice. 3. Destination country or territory accepts paperless invoice. 4. Invoice data is supplied by the client and the data passes validation. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“FormGroupIdName”: {}}}}}} FormGroupIdName Required: No Contains description text which identifies the group of International Type: String forms. This element does not appear on the forms.

Valid for UPS filed (option Type: String 3), Shipper filed (option 1- A , 1-C) Max Allowed: 1 Applicable for EEI form.

Max Allowed: 1 Length: N/A {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“EEIFilingOption”: {“UPSFiled”: {“POA”: {}}}}}}}} POA Required: Yes* Container for POA.

blocks.text: 이 가이드는 UPS 배송 시스템의 API를 설명합니다.
개발자들이 배송 요청을 만들 때 사용합니다.

vocabularyAnalysis.simplifiedDefinition: 새로운 아이디어로 더 좋은 방법을 만드는 것

blocks.text: 바코드로 라벨 하단에 표시할 수 있습니다.
패키지 ID는 고객이 정하는 고유한 번호입니다.
이 번호로 배송 상황을 추적할 수 있습니다.

vocabularyAnalysis.simplifiedDefinition: 보내는 사람에서 받는 사람으로 가는 것
examples: 정방향 배송은 집에서 친구 집으로 보내는 것입니다

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 UPS 배송 라벨 이미지. 큰 박스에 바코드와 패키지 ID가 표시된 모습. 간단한 만화풍, 밝은 색상, 텍스트 최소화
blocks.alt: UPS 배송 라벨에 바코드가 표시된 모습

vocabularyAnalysis.definition: 여러 정보를 담는 그릇 역할을 하는 것
vocabularyAnalysis.simplifiedDefinition: 여러 정보를 한 곳에 모아두는 상자 같은 것

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 UPS 액세스 포인트 이미지. 편의점이나 픽업 장소에서 택배를 받는 모습. 간단한 만화풍, 밝은 색상

blocks.text: 특별한 반송 배송을 처리하는 고유 키입니다.

examples: 이중 확인은 두 번 확인하는 것입니다

blocks.text: 두 번째 단계에서 이 번호를 사용합니다.
이 표시가 있으면 자세한 정보를 받을 수 있습니다.
청구 가능한 무게 계산 방법을 알 수 있습니다.
요금 계산 방법 정보도 받을 수 있습니다.
배송에 적용되는 세금 정보를 요청하는 표시입니다.
이 표시가 있으면 세금 관련 정보를 받습니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 세금 계산 이미지. 계산기와 돈, 세금 표시가 있는 간단한 그림. 밝은 색상, 만화풍

blocks.text: 배송할 때 추가로 선택할 수 있는 서비스들입니다.
여러 가지 특별한 서비스를 담는 컨테이너입니다.
필요에 따라 선택해서 사용할 수 있습니다.

vocabularyAnalysis.definition: 여러 가지 중에서 선택할 수 있는 것
examples: 피자 토핑을 여러 옵션 중에서 골랐습니다

blocks.text: 토요일에도 배송을 받을 수 있는 서비스입니다.
이 표시가 있으면 토요일 배송을 요청한 것입니다.
표시가 없으면 토요일 배송을 원하지 않는 것입니다.
받는 사람이 돈을 내고 물건을 받는 서비스입니다.
유럽 지역 국가에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.

vocabularyAnalysis.definition: 물건을 받을 때 돈을 내는 것

blocks.text: 매일 픽업이나 드롭 배송 계정만 가능합니다.
반송 서비스와는 함께 사용할 수 없습니다.
착불 금액과 통화 코드를 입력해야 합니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 착불 배송 이미지. 택배기사가 물건을 전달하고 돈을 받는 모습. 간단한 만화풍, 밝은 색상
blocks.alt: 착불로 택배를 받으며 돈을 내는 모습

blocks.text: 유럽 지역 국가에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.
일반 착불 서비스와는 함께 쓸 수 없습니다.
반송 서비스와도 함께 사용할 수 없습니다.
받을 사람만 물건을 받을 수 있는 서비스입니다.
픽업 대기 배송에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.

examples: 수취인이 집에 없어서 택배를 다시 배송했습니다

blocks.text: 픽업 대기나 액세스 포인트 배송과는 함께 쓸 수 없습니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 직접 배송 이미지. 택배기사가 정확한 주소의 집 앞에서 배송하는 모습. 간단한 만화풍, 밝은 색상

Name Constraint Description Value Required: Yes* Monetary amount used to specify the worth or price of the commodity.

Type: String Amount should be greater than zero.

Max Allowed: 1 Applies to Invoice and Partial Invoice form. Required for Invoice forms Length: 1…19 and optional for Partial Invoice. Amount should be greater than zero.

Valid characters are 0-9 and. (Decimal point). Limit to 6 digits after the decimal. The maximum length of the field is 19 including '.' and can hold up to 6 decimal places.(#####.######, ######.#####, #######.####, ########.###, #########.##,##########.#,############). The value of this product and the other products should be such that the invoice line total which is the sum of ( number*values) of all products should not exceed 9999999999999999.99 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“CommodityCode”: {}}}}}}} CommodityCode Required: Cond 6-to-15-alphanumeric commodity code. Customs uses this code to Type: String determine what duties should be assessed on the commodity.

Max Allowed: 1 Applies to Invoice, Partial Invoice and NAFTA CO. Required for NAFTA Length: 6…15 CO and optional for Partial Invoice. Should be at least 6 alphanumeric.

For NAFTA CO: For each good described in Description of Goods field, identify the H.S. tariff classification to six digits. If the good is subject to a specific rule of origin in Annex 401 that requires eight digits, identify to eight digits, using the H.S. tariff classification of the country or territory into whose territory the good is imported.

To avoid shipment delays please include this for UPS® Worldwide Economy service. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“PartNumber”: {}}}}}}} PartNumber Required: No The part number or reference number for the product contained in the Type: String invoice line, as indicated on the customs invoice.

Max Allowed: 1 Applies to Invoice and Partial Invoice. Required for Invoice forms and Length: 1…35 optional for Partial Invoice.

To avoid shipment delays please include this for UPS® Worldwide Economy service. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“OriginCountryCode”: {}}}}}}} OriginCountryCode Required: Cond The country or territory in which the good was manufactured, produced Type: String or grown. For detailed information on country or territory of origin, Max Allowed: 1 certificate of origin, rules of origin, and any related matters, please refer Length: 2 to the U.S. Customs and Border Protection Web site at www.customs.gov or contact your country’s or territory's Customs authority.

To avoid shipment delays please include this for UPS® Worldwide Economy service. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“JointProductionIndicator”: {}}}}}}} JointProductionIndicator Required: No If present, JNT will be used as the origin of country or territory code on Type: String the NAFTA form and the Product/OriginCountryCode tag will be Max Allowed: 1 ignored.

Length: 0 Applies to NAFTA CO only. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“NetCostCode”: {}}}}}}} NetCostCode Required: Cond For each good described in the Description of Goods field, where the Type: String good is subject to a regional value content (RVC) requirement, indicate Max Allowed: 1 NC if the RVC is calculated according to the net cost method; Length: 2 © 2023 United Parcel Service of America, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Confidential and Proprietary 68

Name Constraint Description otherwise, indicate NO. If the RVC is calculated over a period of time then indicate “NC with begin/end date” by passing code “ND” Applies to NAFTA CO only. Required for NAFTA CO. Valid values: NC, ND and NO. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“NetCostDateRange”: {}}}}}}} NetCostDateRange Required: No Date Range for regional value content (RVC).

Type: Container Applies to NAFTA CO only.

Max Allowed: 1 Length: N/A {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“NetCostDateRange”: {“BeginDate”: {}}}}}}}} BeginDate Required: Yes* If the RVC is calculated over a period of time, it should be identified by Type: String the begin date (yyyyMMdd) of that period. (Reference: Articles 402.1, Max Allowed: 1 402.5).

Length: 8 Applies to NAFTA CO only. Format is yyyyMMdd. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“NetCostDateRange”: {“EndDate”: {}}}}}}}} EndDate Required: Yes* If the RVC is calculated over a period of time, it should be identified by Type: String the End date (yyyyMMdd) of that period. (Reference: Articles 402.1, Max Allowed: 1 402.5).

Length: 8 Applies to NAFTA CO only. Format is yyyyMMdd. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“PreferenceCriteria”: {}}}}}}} PreferenceCriteria Required: Cond Indicates the criterion (A through F) for each good described in the Type: String Description of Goods field if applicable. The rules of origin are Max Allowed: 1 contained in Chapter Four and Annex 401. Additional rules are Length: 1 described in Annex 703.2 (certain agricultural goods), Annex 300-B, Appendix 6 (certain textile goods) and Annex 308.1 (certain automatic data processing goods and their parts).

Applies to NAFTA CO only. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“ProducerInfo”: {}}}}}}} ProducerInfo Required: Cond Indicate the following: Yes - If shipper is the producer of the good. If Type: String not, state 02, 03, and 04 depending on whether this certificate was Max Allowed: 1 based upon: No [1] - Knowledge of whether the good qualifies as an Length: 3…5 originating good. No [2] - Reliance on the producers written representation (other than a Certificate of Origin) that the good qualifies as an originating good. No [3] - A completed and signed Certificate for the good voluntarily provided to the exporter by the producer.

Applicable for NAFTA CO and is required. Valid values: Yes, No [1], No [2], and No [3]. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“MarksAndNumbers”: {}}}}}}} MarksAndNumbers Required: No Any special marks, codes, and numbers that may appear on package.

Type: String Applies to CO Only.

Max Allowed: 1 Length: 1…35 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“NumberOfPackagesPerCommodity”: {}}}}}}} NumberOfPackagesPer Required: Cond The total number of packages, cartons, or containers for the Commodity Type: String commodity. © 2023 United Parcel Service of America, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Confidential and Proprietary 69

blocks.text: 이 문서는 UPS 배송 시스템의 설정 방법을 설명합니다.
국제 배송을 위한 여러 양식들을 다룹니다.
여러 가지 코드 중 하나를 선택해야 합니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 배송 양식 설정 화면. 컴퓨터 화면에 간단한 입력 칸들과 체크박스들이 보이는 모습. 밝은 파란색과 초록색 사용, 만화풍 스타일, 복잡한 텍스트 없이 아이콘 중심

blocks.text: 물건을 목적지 나라로 보내는 역할을 합니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 주소 입력 양식. 간단한 입력 칸들이 세로로 정렬된 모습. 회사명, 주소, 도시, 우편번호 칸이 명확히 구분됨. 밝은 색상, 큰 글씨, 만화풍

blocks.text: O는 기타 또는 알 수 없음입니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 배송 과정 설명 이미지. 발송인→중간업체→최종수취인으로 이어지는 화살표와 간단한 사람 아이콘들. 밝은 색상, 만화풍, 단계별로 명확히 구분
blocks.alt: 물건이 여러 단계를 거쳐 배송되는 과정

blocks.text: 생산자 연락처 정보도 입력할 수 있습니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 생산자 정보 입력 화면. 공장 건물 아이콘과 함께 회사명, 주소, 전화번호 입력 칸들. 밝은 색상, 간단한 레이아웃, 만화풍 스타일
9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 상품 정보 입력 화면. 여러 상품 박스들과 함께 상품명, 수량, 가격 입력 칸들. 밝은 색상, 간단한 아이콘들, 만화풍 스타일
9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 수량과 가격 입력 화면. 계산기와 저울 아이콘, 숫자 입력 칸들. 개, kg, 리터 등의 단위 선택 버튼들. 밝은 색상, 간단한 레이아웃

Name Constraint Description Max Allowed: 1 Applicable for CO and is required. Should be numeric. Valid characters Length: 1…3 are 0 -9. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“ProductWeight”: {}}}}}}}} ProductWeight Required: Cond The shipping weight, including containers, for each commodity with a Type: Container separate Harmonized Tariff Code / Schedule B Number. This weight Max Allowed: 1 does not include carrier equipment.

Length: N/A Applies to CO and EEI forms only. Required for CO and EEI forms.

To avoid shipment delays please include this for UPS® Worldwide Economy service. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“ProductWeight”: {“UnitOfMeasurement”: {}}}}}}}} UnitOfMeasurement Required: Yes* Container tag for the Unit of Measurement of weight.

Type: Container Applies to CO and EEI forms only.

Max Allowed: 1 Length: N/A {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“ProductWeight”: {“UnitOfMeasurement”: {“Code”: {}}}}}}}}} Code Required: No Code for unit of Measurement of weight.

Type: String Applies to CO and EEI forms only. Valid values: KGS, LBS Max Allowed: 1 Length: 3 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“ProductWeight”: {“Weight”: {}}}}}}}} Weight Required: Yes* Weight of Product.

Type: String Applies to CO and EEI forms only. Valid characters are 0-9 and ‘.’ Max Allowed: 1 (Decimal point). Limit to 1 digit after the decimal. The maximum length Length: 1…5 of the field is 5 including ‘.’ and can hold up to 1 decimal place. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“VehicleID”: {}}}}}}} VehicleID Required: No Includes the following information for used self-propelled vehicles as Type: String defined in Customs regulations 19 CFR 192.1: The unique Vehicle Max Allowed: 1 Identification Number (VIN) in the proper format. Or The Product Length: 1…25 Identification Number (PIN) for those used self-propelled vehicles for which there are no VINs. Or the Vehicle Title Number.

Applies to EEI forms only. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“ScheduleB”: {}}}}}}} ScheduleB Required: Cond Container tag for the schedule B information of a commodity.

Type: Container Applies to EEI forms only. Required for EEI form Max Allowed: 1 Length: N/A {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“ScheduleB”: {“Number”: {}}}}}}}} Number Required: Yes* A unique 10-digit commodity classification code for the item being Type: String exported. (To classify a commodity access the following Web page: Max Allowed: 1 http://www.census.gov/foreign-trade/schedules/b/#search).

Length: 10 Applies to EEI forms only. Has to be 10 characters. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“ScheduleB”: {“Quantity”: {}}}}}}}} © 2023 United Parcel Service of America, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Confidential and Proprietary 70

Name Constraint Description Quantity Required: Cond The count of how many Schedule B units of the current good are in the Type: String shipment (EEI only). For example, if the Schedule B unit of measure is Max Allowed: 2 dozens and eight dozen, is being shipped, indicate 8 in this field.

Length: 1…10 Applies to EEI forms only. Conditionally required for EEI forms if ScheduleB UnitOfMeasurement is not X. Should be Numeric. Valid characters are 0 -9. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“ScheduleB”: {“UnitOfMeasurement”: {}}}}}}}} UnitOfMeasurement Required: Yes* The unit of measure indicated on the Export License.

Type: Container Applies to EEI forms only.

Max Allowed: 2 Length: N/A {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“ScheduleB”: {“UnitOfMeasurement”: {“Code”: {}}}}}}}} Code Required: Yes* The unit of measure indicated on the Export License. Enter an X if there Type: String is no unit of measure in the Schedule B Unit field.

Max Allowed: 1 Applies to EEI forms only. Required for the EEI form. Refer to Length: 1…3 ScheduleB Unit of Measure Codes in the Appendix for valid values. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“ExportType”: {}}}}}}} ExportType Required: Cond Code indicating Domestic: Exports that have been produced, Type: String manufactured, or grown in the United States or Puerto Rico. This Max Allowed: 1 includes imported merchandise which has been enhanced in value or Length: 1 changed from the form in which imported by further manufacture or processing in the United States or Puerto Rico. Foreign: Merchandise that has entered the United States and is being exported again in the same condition as when imported.

Applies to EEI forms only. Required for EEI form. Valid values: D: Domestic; F: Foreign. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“SEDTotalValue”: {}}}}}}} SEDTotalValue Required: Cond This amount will always be USD.

Type: String Applies to EEI forms only. Required for EEI form. Valid characters are Max Allowed: 1 0-9 and ‘.’ (Decimal point). Limit to 2 digit after the decimal. The Length: 1…15 maximum length of the field is 15 including ‘.’ and can hold up to 2 decimal places. Note: This value is calculated based on the Product/Unit/Value and : {“Product”: {“Unit”: {“Number (Number of Units * Price per Unit). If the total value is incorrect it will be replaced by the actual calculated total value. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“ExcludeFromForm”: {}}}}}}} ExcludeFromForm Required: No Container tag for determining whether or not to exclude product Type: Container information from a particular form.

Max Allowed: 1 If this container is not present we assume that the DEFAULT is Length: N/A selected which is "none" and all products will appear on all forms. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“ExcludeFromForm”: {“FormType”: {}}}}}}}} FormType Required: Yes* Indicates the name of the International form requested to NOT have Type: String product information.

Max Allowed: Possible Values are 04 – NAFTA CO. Please note that if this is used UNB Length: and you 1…2 DO NOT have the corresponding form type requested this will be IGNORED. © 2023 United Parcel Service of America, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Confidential and Proprietary 71

Name Constraint Description {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“PackingListInfo”: {}}}}}}} PackingListInfo Required: Cond Data Container holding package related information.

Type: Container Required for packaging list and Air Freight Packing list.

Max Allowed: 1 Length: N/A {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“PackingListInfo”: {“PackageAssociated”: {}}}}}}}} PackageAssociated Required: Yes* Data Container holding package/product related information that will Type: Container break up the product into each package on the packing list.

Max Allowed: Required for packaging list and Air Freight Packing list.

UNB Length: N/A {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“PackingListInfo”: {“PackageAssociated”: {“PackageNumber”: {}}}}}}}}} PackageNumber Required: Yes* Package number the product should be allocated to ont he packing list.

Type: String Required for packaging list and Air Freight Packing list.

Max Allowed: 1 Length: N/A {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“PackingListInfo”: {“PackageAssociated”: {“ProductAmount”: {}}}}}}}}} ProductAmount Required: Yes* Amount of Product associated with a package.

Type: String Required for packaging list and Air Freight Packing list.

Max Allowed: 1 Length: N/A {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“EEIInformation”: {}}}}}}} EEIInformation Required: Cond Required for EEI form.

Type: Container Applies to EEI form only.

Max Allowed: 1 Length: N/A {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“EEIInformation”: {“ExportInformation”: {}}}}}}}} ExportInformation Required: Cond Required for EEI form id it is a SDL product. Valid values: LC, LV, Type: String SS,MS, GS, DP, HR, UG, IC, SC, DD, HH, SR, TE,TL, IS, CR, GP, RJ, Max Allowed: 1 TP, IP, IR, DB, CH, RS, OS Length: 2 Applies to EEI form only. Required if EEIFilingOption code 3 specified for EEI form. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“EEIInformation”: {“License”: {}}}}}}}} License Required: Cond Licence information for SDL commodity.

Type: Container Applies to EEI form only.

Max Allowed: 1 Length: N/A {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“EEIInformation”: {“License”: {“Number”: {}}}}}}}} Number Required: Cond Represents any one of the following values: export license number, Type: String exception code, CFR citation, KPC Number, ACM Number.

Max Allowed: 1 Applies to EEI form only. Refer to EEI License Types and Exemptions Length: 7…13 in the Appendix for valid values and formats. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“EEIInformation: {“License”: {“Code”: {} }}}}}}}} © 2023 United Parcel Service of America, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Confidential and Proprietary 72

Name Constraint Description Code Required: Cond The standard license code published by US government. Refer to EEI Type: String License Codes in the Appendix for valid values.

Max Allowed: 1 Applies to EEI form only. It is required for EEIFilingOption code 3. It is Length: 3 optionally required for all other filing types; however, it is used to categorize each product as SDL or non-SDL. It is also used to identify which piece of information is applicable. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“EEIInformation: {“License”: {“LicenseLineValue”: {}}}}}}}}} LicenseLineValue Required: Cond The export monetary amount allowed per license. Required for a Type: String licensable product when the EEI form is selected. Format: Whole Max Allowed: 1 numbers only.

Length: 1…10 Applies to EEI form only. Required if EEIFilingOption code 1A (only for SDL shipments) or 3. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“EEIInformation: {“License”: {“ECCNNumber”: {}}}}}}}}} ECCNNumber Required: Cond Product ECCN Number issued by BIS (Bureau of Industry and Type: String Security). If the license number is a commerce license, ECCN must be Max Allowed: 1 provided. The format is #A### or EAR99 Length: 5 Applies to EEI forms only. It is required for EEIFilingOption code 3.

ECCN is required one of the following License Exception Codes is entered: CIV, CTP, ENC, GBS, KMI, LVS, TSR {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“EEIInformation”: {“DDTCInformation”: {}}}}}}}} DDTCInformation Required: Cond Department of State/ Directorate of Defense Trade Control Information.

Type: Container This element is a container for additional information that is applicable Max Allowed: 1 to SDL products. It will only be evaluated if the provided license code is Length: N/A an SDL code.

Applies to EEI Form only. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“EEIInformation”: {“DDTCInformation”: {“ITARExemptionNumber”: {}}}}}}}}} ITARExemptionNumber Required: Cond The specific citation (exemption number) under the International Traffic Type: String in Arms Regulations (ITAR) from the Code of Federal Register (see 22 Max Allowed: 1 CFR 120-130) that exempts the shipment from the requirements for a Length: 3…10 license or other written authorization from the Directorate of Trade Controls (DDTC). Refer to EEI License Codes in the Appendix for valid values.

Applies to EEI Form only. This field is applicable for EEIFiling option 1A and 3. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“EEIInformation”: {“DDTCInformation”: {“USMLCategoryCode”: {}}}}}}}}} USMLCategoryCode Required: Cond Digit numeric code (e.g. 01-18, 20 or 21). Indicates the U.S. Munitions Type: String List (USML) category article, service or related technical data as it Max Allowed: 1 applies to the article reported.

Length: 2 Applies to EEI form only. It is required for EEIFilingOption code 3. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“EEIInformation”: {“DDTCInformation”: {“EligiblePartyIndicator”: {}}}}}}}}} EligiblePartyIndicator Required: No Presence/Absent indicator. Certification by the U.S. exporter that the Type: String exporter is an eligible party to participate in the defense trade.

Max Allowed: 1 Length: 0 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“EEIInformation: {“DDTCInformation”: {“RegistrationNumber © 2023 United Parcel Service of America, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Confidential and Proprietary 73

Name Constraint Description RegistrationNumber Required: Cond It is a unique registration code assigned to the registrant. The DDTC Type: String registration code consist of a letter prefix, M (assigned to a Max Allowed: 1 manufacturer and/or exporter) or K (assigned to a broker), followed by Length: 6 four or five digits (e.g. K-1234 or M12345).

It is required for EEIFilingOption code 3. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“EEIInformation: {“DDTCInformation”: {“Quantity Quantity Required: Cond Export Quantity.

Type: String Applies to EEI form only. It is required for EEIFilingOption code 3. Only Max Allowed: 1 positive integer value is valid.

Length: 1…7 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“EEIInformation: {“DDTCInformation”: {“UnitOfMeasurement”: {}}}}}}}}} UnitOfMeasurement Required: Cond Container for unit of measurement.

Type: Container Applies to EEI form only. It is required for EEIFilingOption code 3.

Max Allowed: 1 Length: N/A {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“EEIInformation: {“DDTCInformation”: {“UnitOfMeasurement”: {“Code”: {}}}}}}}}}} Code Required: Yes* Required for EEI form. Unit of measurement code. The two or three (3) Type: String alpha unit of measurement for the article being shipped. For example: Max Allowed: 1 BAG/BG - bags Length: 2…3 Applies to EEI form only. It is required for EEIFilingOption code 1A and 3. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“EEIInformation: {“DDTCInformation”: {“UnitOfMeasurement”: {“Description”: {}}}}}}}}}} Description Required: No Description for Unit of Measurement.

Type: String Applies to EEI form only.

Max Allowed: 1 Length: 1…15 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“EEIInformation: {“DDTCInformation”: {“SignificantMilitaryEquipmentIndicator”: {}}}}}}}}} SignificantMilitaryEquipm Required: No Presence/ Absence Indicator. entIndicator Type: String Applies to EEI form only.

Max Allowed: 1 Length: 0 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“EEIInformation: {“DDTCInformation”: {“ACMNumber”: {}}}}}}}}} ACMNumber Required: Cond Approved Community Member Number (ACM). It is required to be Type: String provided along with ITARExemptionNumber for some License code Max Allowed: 1 (SGB and SAU). The ACM# for the United Kingdom (License code Length: 11 SGB) must begin with UK followed by 9 numbers. The ACM# for Australia (License Code SAU) must begin with DTT followed by 8 numbers.

Applies to EEI form only. It is required for EEIFilingOption code 1A and 3. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“ProductCurrencyCode”: {}}}}}}} ProductCurrencyCode Required: Cond Required when LandedCostIndicator is present in the request Type: String Max Allowed: 1 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Product”: {“TaxesPaid”: {}}}}}}} © 2023 United Parcel Service of America, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Confidential and Proprietary 74

Name Constraint Description TaxesPaid Required: No Invoice Commodity Level Tax Collected Code for each shipment Type: String commodity line. [TaxesPaid = 0 - No on Report], [TaxesPaid = 1 - Max Allowed: 1 Yes on Report], [TaxesPaid = empty - null on Report], [If Length: N/A TaxesPaid is not passed in input request = null on Report] {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“InvoiceNumber”: {}}}}}} InvoiceNumber Required: No Commercial Invoice number assigned by the exporter.

Type: String Applies to Invoice and Partial Invoice forms only. Required for Invoice Max Allowed: 1 forms and optional for Partial Invoice.

Length: 1…35 To avoid shipment delays please include this for UPS® Worldwide Economy service. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“InvoiceDate”: {}}}}}} InvoiceDate Required: No Date when the Invoice is created. Ideally this is the same as the ship Type: String date.

Max Allowed: 1 Applies to Invoice and Partial Invoice forms only. Required for Invoice Length: 8 forms and optional for Partial Invoice. Required for Invoice form for forward shipments. For shipment with return service, the user input will be ignored, and the field will be blank on the invoice. Format is yyyyMMdd. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“PurchaseOrderNumber”: {}}}}}} PurchaseOrderNumber Required: No The customer's order reference number.

Type: String Applies to Invoice and Partial Invoice forms only.

Max Allowed: 1 Length: 1…35 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“TermsOfShipment”: {}}}}}} TermsOfShipment Required: No Indicates the rights to the seller from the buyer. Also, it refers to Terms Type: String of Sale.

Max Allowed: 1 Applies to Invoice and Partial Invoice forms only. Valid values: CFR: Length: 3 Cost and Freight CIF: Cost Insurance and Freight CIP: Carriage and Insurance Paid CPT: Carriage Paid To DAF: Delivered at Frontier DDP: Delivery Duty Paid DDU: Delivery Duty Unpaid DEQ: Delivered Ex Quay DES: Delivered Ex Ship EXW: Ex Works FAS: Free Alongside Ship FCA: Free Carrier FOB: Free On Board {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“ReasonForExport”: {}}}}}} ReasonForExport Required: Cond A reason to export the current international shipment. Valid values: Type: String SALE, GIFT, SAMPLE, RETURN, REPAIR, INTERCOMPANYDATA, Max Allowed: 1 Any other reason.

Length: 1…20 Applies to Invoice and Partial Invoice forms only. Required for Invoice forms and Optional for Partial Invoice. No validation. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: {“Comments”: {}}}}}} Comments Required: No Any extra information about the current shipment.

Type: String Applies to Invoice and Partial Invoice forms only.

Max Allowed: 1 Length: 1…150 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentServiceOptions”: {“InternationalForms”: “DeclarationStatement”: {}}}}}} DeclarationStatement Required: No This is the legal explanation, used by Customs, for the delivering of this Type: String shipment. It must be identical to the set of declarations actually used by Max Allowed: 1 Customs. Examples of declarations that might be entered in this field Length: 1…550 are: I hereby certify that the goods covered by this shipment qualify as originating goods for purposes of preferential tariff treatment under the NAFTA. I hereby certify that the information on this invoice is true and © 2023 United Parcel Service of America, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Confidential and Proprietary 75

blocks.text: 이 문서는 UPS 배송 시스템의 API를 설명합니다.
API는 컴퓨터 프로그램들이 서로 대화하는 방법입니다.
운송 회사의 장비 무게는 포함하지 않습니다.
UPS 전 세계 경제 서비스를 사용할 때 필요합니다.
킬로그램(KGS) 또는 파운드(LBS)를 사용할 수 있습니다.
이 설정도 CO와 EEI 양식에만 적용됩니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 UPS 배송 무게 측정 이미지. 저울 위에 상자가 올려져 있고, 디지털 화면에 무게가 표시됨. KGS와 LBS 단위 표시. 밝은 색상, 만화풍, 간단한 아이콘

blocks.text: 소수점 뒤에는 한 자리 숫자만 쓸 수 있습니다.
또는 차량 등록증 번호를 사용할 수도 있습니다.
이 코드로 어떤 상품인지 알 수 있습니다.
미국 정부 웹사이트에서 코드를 찾을 수 있습니다.
EEI 양식을 작성할 때 반드시 필요합니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 상품 분류 코드 이미지. 다양한 상품들(옷, 장난감, 음식 등)이 각각 10자리 숫자 코드와 함께 표시됨. 밝은 색상, 만화풍, 간단한 레이아웃

blocks.text: 스케줄 B 단위가 X가 아닐 때만 필요합니다.
상품의 전체 가격을 미국 달러로 적습니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 달러 화폐 이미지. 미국 달러 지폐와 동전들이 표시되고, 계산기와 함께 총 금액을 계산하는 모습. 밝은 색상, 만화풍

blocks.text: 소수점 뒤에는 두 자리까지 쓸 수 있습니다.
특정 상품을 양식에서 빼고 싶을 때 사용합니다.
NAFTA CO 양식에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.
상품이 어떤 포장에 들어있는지 알려주는 정보입니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 포장 목록 이미지. 여러 개의 상자들이 번호가 매겨져 있고, 각 상자 안에 들어있는 물건들이 목록으로 표시됨. 밝은 색상, 만화풍

blocks.text: 각 포장에 들어있는 상품의 양도 적어야 합니다.
이 정보는 포장 목록을 만들 때 반드시 필요합니다.
SDL 상품인 경우에만 필요한 정보도 있습니다.
EEI 양식 옵션 코드에 따라 필요한 정보가 달라집니다.
수출 허가증 번호나 면제 코드를 적는 곳입니다.
SDL 상품에 대한 특별한 정보도 들어갑니다.
미국 정부에서 정한 표준 라이선스 코드입니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 라이선스 코드 이미지. 공식 문서와 코드표가 표시되고, 체크리스트 형태로 정리됨. 밝은 색상, 만화풍, 간단한 레이아웃

blocks.text: EEI 양식 옵션 코드 3에서는 반드시 필요합니다.
라이선스가 필요한 상품에서 반드시 적어야 합니다.
상업 라이선스인 경우 반드시 제공해야 합니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세 난독증 아동을 위한 ECCN 번호 형식 이미지. #A###와 EAR99 형식이 예시와 함께 표시됨. 밝은 색상, 만화풍, 간단한 텍스트

blocks.text: 특정 라이선스 면제 코드와 함께 사용됩니다.
라이선스 코드가 SDL 코드일 때만 확인합니다.

blocks.text: 이 문서는 UPS 배송 시스템을 사용하는 방법을 설명합니다.
개발자들이 배송 요청을 만들 때 필요한 정보들을 담고 있습니다.
ReturnOfDocumentIndicator는 문서 반환 서비스를 요청할 때 사용합니다.
이 설정은 폴란드에서 폴란드로 보내는 배송에만 사용할 수 있습니다.
JSON 형식으로 요청할 때 이 설정을 포함시킬 수 있습니다.
이 설정이 있으면 특별한 수입 관리 절차를 따릅니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세를 위한 UPS 배송 시스템 설명 이미지. 컴퓨터 화면에 배송 설정 옵션들이 표시된 모습. 간단한 아이콘들과 밝은 색상, 만화풍 스타일

blocks.text: LabelMethod는 수입 관리 라벨의 종류를 정합니다.
이 설정은 수입 관리 배송에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.
이 설명은 라벨 방법을 이해하는 데 도움이 됩니다.
배송업체가 최종 수령인에게 배송하기 전에 상업 송장을 제거합니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세를 위한 배송 라벨과 송장 설명 이미지. 배송 상자에 붙은 라벨과 송장 서류들. 간단하고 명확한 일러스트, 밝은 색상

blocks.text: 배송업체는 이 요청에 따라 송장을 처리합니다.
배송 과정에서 발생하는 탄소를 상쇄하는 서비스입니다.
이 설정이 있으면 탄소 중립 배송이 만들어집니다.
UPS Exchange 이동과 Pack & Collect 배송에 사용됩니다.
이메일, 음성, 문자 메시지로 알림을 받을 수 있습니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세를 위한 배송 알림 서비스 설명 이미지. 스마트폰에 배송 알림 메시지가 표시된 모습. 이메일, 문자, 전화 아이콘들. 밝고 친근한 색상
9-13세를 위한 다양한 알림 방법 설명 이미지. 이메일, 전화, 문자메시지 아이콘들이 배송 상자 주변에 배치된 모습. 화살표로 연결, 밝은 색상

blocks.text: 유효한 언어와 방언 조합을 사용해야 합니다.
이 설정이 있으면 교환 배송이 만들어집니다.
라벨에 'EXCHANGE-LIKE ITEM ONLY' 문구가 기본으로 표시됩니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세를 위한 교환 배송 과정 설명 이미지. 잘못된 상품과 올바른 상품이 화살표로 연결된 모습. 배송 상자들과 교환 표시. 밝고 이해하기 쉬운 일러스트

blocks.text: 빈 태그는 이 설정이 있다는 뜻입니다.
UPS Worldwide Express Freight 서비스에서만 유효합니다.
빈 태그는 이 설정이 있다는 뜻입니다.
빈 태그는 이 설정이 있다는 뜻입니다.

blocks.prompt: 9-13세를 위한 리프트 게이트 트럭 설명 이미지. 트럭 뒤쪽에 승강기 같은 장치가 있는 모습. 무거운 상자를 올리고 내리는 장면. 간단하고 명확한 일러스트

blocks.text: Drop Off At UPS Facility와 함께 사용할 수 없습니다.
UPS Worldwide Express Freight 서비스에서만 유효합니다.
Hold For Pickup과 함께 사용할 수 없습니다.
특정 조건에서는 배송용 리프트 게이트를 사용할 수 없습니다.
이 설정이 있으면 EEI 양식이나 EEI 제출 옵션이 필요합니다.
SDL 배송에는 특별한 서류 작업이 필요합니다.

Type: Container Max Allowed: 1 Length: N/A {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“Notification”: {“EMail”: {“EMailAddress”: {}}}}}}}} EMailAddress Required: Yes* The destination email address of the receiver returns notification email.

The "From" field of the Max Allowed: 1 message header contains pkginfo@ups.com.

Length: 1…50 Only allowed at the first package. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“Notification”: {“EMail”: {“FromName”: {}}}}}}}} FromName Required: No The name the receiver return notification will appear to be from.

Max Allowed: 1 Only allowed at the first package.

Length: 1…75 © 2023 United Parcel Service of America, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Confidential and Proprietary 92

Name Constraint Description {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“Notification”: {“EMail”: {“SubjectCode”: {}}}}}}}} SubjectCode Required: No Specifies a reference code and reference number to display in the Type: String subject of the Receiver Return Notification. When the subject code is Max Allowed: 1 provided, the subject will contain the following: UPS Receiver Return Length: 2 Notification. The reference code (the reference code will be mapped to the corresponding ANSI value) Plus the reference number.

If the subject code tag is not provided and the subject text is provided, the subject of the notification will be the subject text. If the subject text is provided, and subject code tag exists, then the subject code value must be 08. If the subject code is 08, the subject text must exist. If a subject code is provided that refers to a nonexistent reference number, the subject will default to the tracking number. Only allowed at the first package. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“HazMat”: {}}}}}} HazMat Required: No Container to hold HazMat Chemical Records.

Type: Container Max Allowed: 3 Length: N/A {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“HazMat”: {“PackagingTypeQuantity PackagingTypeQuantity Required: No The number of pieces of the specific commodity. Required if Type: String CommodityRegulatedLevelCode = LQ or FR.

Max Allowed: 1 Valid values are 1 to 999.

Length: 1…3 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“HazMat”: {“RecordIdentifier1”: {}}}}}}} RecordIdentifier1 Required: No Reserved for future use.

Type: String Max Allowed: 1 Length: N/A {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“HazMat”: {“RecordIdentifier2”: {}}}}}}} RecordIdentifier2 Required: No Reserved for future use.

Max Allowed: 1 Secondary hazardous characteristics of a package. (There can be more Length: 7 than one – separate each with a comma). {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“HazMat”: {“aDRItemNumber”: {}}}}}}} aDRItemNumber Required: No The type of regulated good for an ADR package where ADR is for Type: String Europe to Europe ground movement.

Max Allowed: 1 Length: 10 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“HazMat”: {“aDRPackingGroupLetter”: {}}}}}}} © 2023 United Parcel Service of America, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Confidential and Proprietary 93

Name Constraint Description aDRPackingGroupLetter Required: No Required if the field applies to the material by regulation. Field input is Type: String Arabic numerals, output is Roman numerals. Will be shown in Roman Max Allowed: 1 Numerals.

Length: 1 Valid values: “1” = “I”, “2” = “II”, “3” = “III”, and blank. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“HazMat”: {“TechnicalName”: {}}}}}}} TechnicalName Required: No The technical name (when required) for the specified commodity.

Type: String Required if CommodityRegulatedLevelCode = LQ or FR and if the field Max Allowed: 1 applies to the material by regulation.

Length: 200 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“HazMat”: {“HazardLabelRequired”: {}}}}}}} HazardLabelRequired Required: No Defines the type of label that is required on the package for the Type: String commodity. Not applicable if CommodityRegulatedLevelCode = LR or Max Allowed: 1 EQ.

Length: 50 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“HazMat”: {“ClassDivisionNumber”: {}}}}}}} ClassDivisionNumber Required: Cond This is the hazard class associated to the specified commodity.

Type: String Required if CommodityRegulatedLevelCode is 'EQ', ‘LQ’ or ‘FR’ Max Allowed: 1 Length: 1…7 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“HazMat”: {“ReferenceNumber”: {}}}}}}} ReferenceNumber Required: No Optional reference number. It will be displayed only on label.

Type: String Max Allowed: 1 Length: 1…15 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“HazMat”: {“Quantity”: {}}}}}}} Quantity Required: Cond Required if CommodityRegulatedLevelCode = EQ, LQ or FR. The Type: String numerical value of the mass capacity of the regulated good.

Max Allowed: 1 Should be more than 0.0. Valid characters are 0-9 and "." (Decimal Length: 1…5 point). Limit to 1 digit after the decimal. The maximum length of the field is 5 including "." (Decimal point) and can hold up to 1 decimal place. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“HazMat”: {“UOM”: {}}}}}}} UOM Required: Cond Required if CommodityRegulatedLevelCode = LQ, EQ or FR. The unit Type: String of measure used for the mass capacity of the regulated good.

Max Allowed: 1 For Example: ml, L, g, mg, kg, cylinder, pound, pint, quart, gallon, Length: 1…10 ounce etc. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“HazMat”: {“PackagingType”: {}}}}}}} PackagingType Required: Cond The type of package used to contain the regulated good. (Ex: Type: String Fiberboard Box). Required if CommodityRegulatedLevelCode = LQ or Max Allowed: 1 FR.

Length: 1…255 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“HazMat”: {“IDNumber”: {}}}}}}} IDNumber Required: Cond This is the ID number (UN/NA/ID) for the specified commodity.

Type: String Required if CommodityRegulatedLevelCode = LR, LQ or FR and if the Max Allowed: 1 field applies to the material by regulation. UN/NA/ID Identification Length: 1…6 Number assigned to the specified regulated good. (Include the UN/NA/ID as part of the entry). {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“HazMat”: {“ProperShippingName”: {}}}}}}} © 2023 United Parcel Service of America, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Confidential and Proprietary 94

Max Allowed: 1 Length: 1…150 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“HazMat”: {“AdditionalDescription”: {}}}}}}} AdditionalDescription Required: No Additional remarks or special provision information. Required if Type: String CommodityRegulatedLevelCode = LQ or FR and if the field applies to Max Allowed: 1 the material by regulation. Additional information that may be required Length: 1…255 by regulation about a hazardous material, such as, “Limited Quantity”, DOT-SP numbers, EX numbers. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“HazMat”: {“PackagingGroupType”: {}}}}}}} PackagingGroupType Required: no This is the packing group category associated to the specified Type: String commodity. Recommended if CommodityRegulatedLevelCode = LQ or Max Allowed: 1 FR and if the field applies to the material by regulation. Must be shown Length: 1…5 in Roman Numerals.

Valid values: I II III blank {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“HazMat”: {“PackagingInstructionCode”: {}}}}}}} PackagingInstructionCod Required: Cond The packing instructions related to the chemical record. Required if e Type: String CommodityRegulatedLevelCode = LQ or FR and if the field applies to Max Allowed: 1 the material by regulation.

Length: 1…4 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“HazMat”: {“EmergencyPhone”: {}}}}}}} EmergencyPhone Required: No 24 Hour Emergency Phone Number of the shipper. Valid values for this Type: String field are (0) through (9) with trailing blanks. For numbers within the Max Allowed: 1 U.S., the layout is 1, area code, 7-digit number. For all other countries Length: 1…25 or territories the layout is country or territory code, area code, number.

The following are restricted in the phone number period “.”, dash “-“, plus sign “+” and conventional parentheses “(“ and “)”, “EXT" or "OPT” {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“HazMat”: {“EmergencyContact”: {}}}}}}} EmergencyContact Required: No The emergency information, contact name and/or contract number, Type: String required to be communicated when a call is placed to the Max Allowed: 1 EmergencyPhoneNumber. The information is required if there is a value Length: 1…35 in the EmergencyPhoneNumber field above and the shipment is with a US50 or PR origin and/or destination and the RegulationSet is IATA. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“HazMat”: {“ReportableQuantity”: {}}}}}}} ReportableQuantity Required: No Recommended if CommodityRegulatedLevelCode = LQ or FR and if Type: String the field applies to the material by regulation. If reportable quantity is Max Allowed: 1 met, 'RQ' should be entered.

Length: 1…2 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“HazMat”: {“RegulationSet”: {}}}}}}} RegulationSet Required: Yes* The Regulatory set associated with every regulated shipment. It must Type: String be same across the shipment. Valid values: ADR = Europe to Europe Max Allowed: 1 Ground Movement CFR = HazMat regulated by US Dept. of Length: 3…4 Transportation within the U.S. or ground shipments to Canada IATA= Worldwide Air movement TDG= Canada to Canada ground movement or Canada to U.S. standard movement.

Valid values are ADR, CFR, IATA and TDG. For multiple Chemical Records per package or multiple packages containing different RegulationSet, RegulationSet of first Chemical Record would be considered for validating and rating the entire shipment. © 2023 United Parcel Service of America, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Confidential and Proprietary 95

Name Constraint Description {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“HazMat”: {“TransportationMode”: {}}}}}}} TransportationMode Required: Yes* Not applicable for ADR regulation set. Required for any other regulation Type: String set. Declares that a package was prepared according to ground Max Allowed: 1 passenger aircraft or cargo aircraft only.

Type: String Valid values are 0 to 4.

Type: String Max Allowed: 1 Length: 1…10 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“HazMat”: {“ChemicalRecordIdentifier”: {}}}}}}} ChemicalRecordIdentifier Required: Cond Identifies the Chemical Record.

Valid values: 00 = KG (Metric Type: String Unit of Measurements) or KGS 01 = LB (English Unit of Measurements) Max Allowed: 1 or LBS Length: 2…3 The following values are valid : 00, 01, KG, KGS, LBS. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“DryIce”: {“DryIceWeight”: {“UnitOfMeasurement”: {“Description”: {}}}}}}}}} Description Required: No Description for unit of measurement for Dry Ice Weight.

Type: String Max Allowed: 1 Length: 1…20 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“DryIce”: {“DryIceWeight”: {“Weight”: {}}}}}}}} Weight Required: Yes* Dry Ice Weight.

Type: String Cannot be more than package weight. Should be more than 0.0. Valid Max Allowed: 1 characters are 0-9 and "." (Decimal point). Limit to 1 digit after the Length: 1…5 decimal. The maximum length of the field is 5 including "." and can hold up to 1 decimal place. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“DryIce”: {“MedicalUseIndicator”: {}}}}}}} MedicalUseIndicator Required: No Presence/Absence Indicator. Max Allowed: 1 Empty Tag means indicator is present. The UPSPremiumCareIndicator Length: 0 cannot be requested for package with Delivery Confirmation - Adult Signature Required and Delivery Confirmation- Signature Required.

UPSPremiumCareIndicator is valid for following Return services: Returns Exchange (available with a contract) Print Return Label Electronic Return Label Return Service Three Attempt The UPSPremiumCareIndicator can be requested with following UPS services: UPS Express® Early UPS Express UPS Express Saver UPS Standard Valid only for Canada to Canada movements. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“PackageServiceOptions”: {“PackageIdentifier”: {}}}}}} PackageIdentifier Required: Cond Identifies the package containing Dangerous Goods.

Length: 10 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“Commodity”: {“NMFC”: {}}}}}} NMFC Required: No Container to hold the NMFC codes.

Type: Container Max Allowed: 1 Length: N/A {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“Commodity”: {“NMFC”: {“PrimeCode” {}}}}}}} PrimeCode Required: Yes* Specifies the Commodity’s NMFC prime code.

Name Constraint Description SubCode Required: No Specifies the Commodity’s NMFC sub code.

Type: String Needs to be provided when the SubCode associated with the Max Allowed: 1 PrimeCode is other than 00. UPS defaults the sub value to 00 if not Length: 2 provided. If provided the Sub Code should be associated with the PrimeCode of the NMFC. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“HazMatPackageInformation”: {}}}}} HazMatPackageInformati Required: No Required when number of hazmat containers in a package is greater on Type: Container than 1. It indicates whether all the hazmat materials are kept in a single Max Allowed: 1 box or multiple boxes.

Length: N/A Required when number of hazmat container in a package is greater than 1. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“HazMatPackageInformation “: {“AllPackedInOneIndicator”: {}}}}}} AllPackedInOneIndicator Required: No Presence/Absence Indicator. Any value is ignored. Presence indicates Type: String if multiple, different hazmat/chemicals are contained within one box in a Max Allowed: 1 package Length: 0 When number of Hazmat containers in a package is more than one, either AllPackedInOneIndicator or OverPackedIndicator is needed {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“Package”: {“HazMatPackageInformation “: {“OverPackedIndicator”: {}}}}}} OverPackedIndicator Required: No Presence/Absence Indicator. Any value is ignored. Presence indicates Type: String that one or more hazmat/chemicals are in separate boxes in a package.

All Rights Reserved. Confidential and Proprietary 99

Name Constraint Description {“ShipmentRequest”: {“Shipment”: {“ShipmentDate:{}}}} ShipmentDate Required: No For SubVersion 2205, user can send up to 7 days in the future with Type: String current date as day zero. Format: YYYYMMDD Max Allowed: 1 Length: N/A {“ShipmentRequest”: {“LabelSpecification”: {}}} LabelSpecification Required: Cond Container used to define the properties required by the user to print Type: Container and/or display the UPS shipping label.

Max Allowed: 1 Required for shipment without return service or shipments with PRL Length: N/A return service. Required for Electronic Return Label or Electronic Import Control Label shipments with SubVersion greater than or equal to 1707. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“LabelSpecification”: {“LabelImageFormat”: {}}}} LabelImageFormat Required: Yes* LabelImageFormat Container.

Type: Container Max Allowed: 1 Length: N/A {“ShipmentRequest”: {“LabelSpecification”: {“LabelImageFormat”: {“Code”: {}}}}} Code Required: Yes* Label print method code determines the format in which Labels are to Type: String be generated. For EPL2 formatted Labels use EPL, for PNG formatted Max Allowed: 1 Labels use PNG and for SPL formatted Labels use SPL, for ZPL Length: 4 formatted Labels use ZPL and for image formats use GIF.

For shipments without return service the valid value is GIF, PNG, ZPL, EPL and SPL. For shipments with PRL return service, the valid values are EPL, ZPL, SPL, PNG and GIF.

For UPS Premier Silver shipment only ZPL is supported. {“ShipmentRequest”: {“LabelSpecification”: {“LabelImageFormat”: {“Description”: {}}}}} Description Required: No Description of the label image format code.

Type: String Max Allowed: 1 Length: 1…35 {“ShipmentRequest”: {“LabelSpecification”: {“HTTPUserAgent”: {}}}} HTTPUserAgent Required: Cond Browser HTTPUserAgent String. This is the preferred way of identifying Type: String GIF image type to be generated.
